name: The Journey of Joedan
description:
Another mini-game where scope got way out of control way too fast. I spent about 8 days on this, which was more than I meant to.

It's still very mini, especially for an adventure, shouldn't take more than 5 minutes.

I really appreciate any attempt to play it. WASD, E to interact, Q to use items if useable, and use the mouse cursor to shuffle items around the boxes. 

An item has to be equipped to trade it. Ice melts into a puddle after 60 seconds. The worm can walk in the desert. 

Once you have the horse, there's nothing left to do but lose it.
